title: Farmers benefit with sustainable agricultural practices

tasks.task: Drive tractor to till the soil
subtasks: Start the tractor engine
Adjust the plow attachment to the tractor
Operate the plow to turn over the soil
Monitor the depth of tilling

tasks.task: Plant seeds in the prepared field
subtasks: Load the planter with seeds
Secure the planter to the tractor
Engage the planter’s seeding mechanism
Drive the tractor through the field to plant seeds
Adjust speed to maintain proper planting depth and spacing

tasks.task: Apply fertilizer to the farmland
subtasks: Attach the fertilizer spreader to the tractor
Adjust the spreader settings for appropriate application rate
Drive the tractor over the field, operating the spreader to disperse fertilizer evenly
Check spreader calibration and make adjustments as needed

tasks.task: Operate the combine harvester to harvest crops
subtasks: Attach the combine harvester to the tractor
Calibrate the combine's cutting height and width
Drive the combine through the ripe crop rows
Monitor the threshing and separating process
Directly collect the harvested grain into bins or bags

tasks.task: Operate the irrigation system to water crops
subtasks: Locate the irrigation system’s control panel
Adjust water pressure and flow rate
Operate the valves or pumps to activate the sprinklers or drip irrigation
Monitor the water distribution and address any clogging or leaks
Turn off the irrigation system when appropriate

tasks.task: Drive tractor to till the soil (subtasks starting the engine, attaching a plow, operating the tiller, checking depth).
Plant seeds (loading the planter, attaching to the tractor, driving, adjusting speed).
Apply fertilizer (attaching spreader, adjusting settings, operating, monitoring).
Harvest crops with a combine (attaching the combine, setting up, driving, collecting grain).
Irrigate the field (operating the irrigation system, checking distribution, troubleshooting leaks).
Drive tractor to till the soil. - Subtasks: Start the tractor, attach plow, operate plow, monitor depth.
Drive tractor to till the soil
Plant seeds
Apply fertilizer
Harvest with combine

subtasks: Calibrate spreader (rate, speed)
Operate spreader while driving
Check application and adjust
Confirm even coverage.
